sub_coverages.description: Appointed Pharmacy for Chronic Medications Supply
Organ Transplant for Heart and Liver (covered in KSA only)
Vaccination of Children as per MOH Specification
Companion Expenses for Children less than 12 yrs. Old
New born babies national Preventive Program
Psychiatric Treatment for Acute Cases of Psychological Disorders
Expenses of Complication of Cardiac Valve replacement
Adult Vaccination based on National Vaccination Schedule for Adults
Sexually transmeted diseases Include cover for Nongonococcal urethritis, Trichomoniasis, HIV, Syphilis, Human Papillomavirus (genetic warts), Neisseria gonorrhoeae, Genetic herpes, Chancroid
The costs of complications resulting from a benefit treatment covered in the policy
Cost of Acquired valvular heart disease

Adult Vaccination based on National Vaccination Schedule for Adults
Sexually transmeted diseases Include cover for Nongonococcal urethritis, Trichomoniasis, HIV, Syphilis, Human Papillomavirus (genetic warts), Neisseria gonorrhoeae, Genetic herpes, Chancroid
The costs of complications resulting from a benefit treatment covered in the policy
Cost of Acquired valvular heart disease
Expenses of Organs Donation Operation for the donor
screening for hearing Impairment and critical congenital heart malformation in newborns.
Costs of infant formula (baby milk powder) in need of medical care up to the age of 24 months to become free of charge.
Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV) immunization program for children according to the Ministry of Health approved immunodeficiency virus vaccines schedule.
Delivery complications are covered up to the maximum benefit limit of this policy.
Cost of newborns coverage on the mother's policy up to a maximum of 30 days from the date of birth until they are added in the policy on retroactive basis from the date of birth
